description.value:
You launch a spear of ice in the direction of a target you can see in range. On a hit, the target takes [[/r 6d10[cold]]] damage and is covered in freezing rime and ice and must make a Fortitude saving throw.

Critical Success The target suffers no additional effects.

Success The target suffers a -10 foot penalty to all its Speeds for 1 minute. It can spend an action to shake off the buildup of rime to end this penalty early.

Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute. It can spend an action to remove this effect.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 2} for 1 minute. To end the effect early, it must spend an action to remove a layer of frost, reducing the value of Slowed to 1, and spend another action to remove the effect entirely.

Heightened (+1) The damage increases by 1d10.
